title: (Updated) Forlinx officially launches RISC-V SoM based on StarFive JH7110
description: Forlinx has officially launched their latest System-on-Module, featuring the powerful StarFive JH7110 RISC-V chip. These versatile SoM and compatible carrier board are now available for order, catering to a wide range of applications including commercial, medical, and industrial automation. Recently, a few embedded products have emerged utilizing the same processor, including the VisionFive 2, Pine64, […]
